boardgame.description: Gaia Project is a new game in the line of Terra Mystica. As in the original Terra Mystica, fourteen different factions live on seven different kinds of planets, and each faction is bound to their own home planets, so to develop and grow, they must terraform neighboring planets into their home environments in competition with the other groups. In addition, Gaia planets can be used by all factions for colonization, and Transdimensional planets can be changed into Gaia planets._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;All factions can improve their skills in six different areas of development _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; Terraforming, Navigation, Artificial Intelligence, Gaiaforming, Economy, Research _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; leading to advanced technology and special bonuses. To do all of that, each group has special skills and abilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The playing area is made of ten sectors, allowing a variable set-up and thus an even bigger replay value than its predecessor Terra Mystica. A two-player game is hosted on seven sectors._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

European shipping is by request but likely to be expensive as the parcel weighs 3kg. Payment by bank transfer or PayPal gift please.

Played twice. Note that this is the German version. The game is language independent. A couple of the factions have different (German) names, and the text on the automata cards is in German. This is a heavy game - I am happy to provide a postage estimate.

This listing is for a copy of Gaia Project in very good condition along with a TowerRex wooden insert (purchased off Etsy). The cards are sleeved with FFG Green card sleeves. The exterior of the game box shows minor wear from storage on a shelf. There is no damage to the game components whatsoever. I will only accept payment via PayPal, and will only ship to the CONUS. Thanks for looking!
